Package com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.view

This package serves to allow this library to function for Android 2.1+ Eclair, as well as utilize custom features like WPMenu.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
WPContextMenu.OnContextItemSelectedListener The interface for returning the item clicked.
WPMenu.OnMenuItemSelectedListener The interface for returning the item clicked.
 

Class Summary
VelocityTracker  
VelocityTracker.Estimator An estimator for the movements of a pointer based on a polynomial model.
VelocityTracker.Velocity Velocity representation.
ViewConfiguration Contains methods to standard constants used in the UI for timeouts, sizes, and distances.
WPContextMenu Note: This current implementation will likely be removed/ completly redone soon and this class should not be used for future projects.
This is the class that manages our context menu items in a PopupWindow.
WPContextMenu.ContextMenuAdapter Custom ArrayAdapter for styling views without needing to supply a valid resource id.
WPMenu Used to simulate the effect of the "AppBar," the bottom row of clickable icons.
WPMenuItem A container class that holds a Drawable and caption text to be used for WPMenu and WPContextMenu.
 

Package com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.view Description

This package serves to allow this library to function for Android 2.1+ Eclair, as well as utilize custom features like WPMenu. Read each class's documentation as not every class should be interfaced directly.

The developer of this library may be contacted at contact@tombarrasso.com.
